mapper.select: SELECT us.usuario_n_codigo as codigo, us.usuario_v_username as username, us.usuario_v_contrasena as contrasena, us.companyid as company FROM T_SEG_USUARIO us WHERE us.usuario_v_username = #{username} AND us.companyid = #{company}

SELECT us.usuario_n_codigo as codigo, us.usuario_v_username as username, us.companyid as company FROM T_SEG_USUARIO us WHERE us.companyid = #{company} AND us.usuario_n_codigo = #{codigo}
ORDER BY us.usuario_n_codigo
